desc.p: Holds the currency of the facility record
Holds the tranche code defined under the facility. This is a multivalue field associated with tranche level balances.
Records the negative movement of the facility
Holds Tax amount calculated on the unavailable fee amount. This amount is calculated using the value in FEE.PERC.UVAL on the fee amount available in TOT.FEE.UVAL field
Records the positive movement of the facility
Records the positive movement of the facility within a Tranche
Holds the percentage used to calculate the fee amount. This field is updated from the commitment fee percentage defined at the facility record
The effective date for the amount defined in the corresponding SL.INIT.AMOUNT field
Holds the outstanding balance of the corresponding tranche defined in TRANCHE.CODE field and effective on a date defined in the corresponding AMT.EFF.DATE field
Holds the effective date for the amounts defined in the corresponding fields TR.OUTS.AMT and TR.AMT.MOVED"
Holds the movement amount when there is a movement in the facility on a date defined at the corresponding field AMT.EFF.DATE
Holds the fee calculation base amount each fee calculation date
Total fee amount for the facility record
Total unavailable portion of fee amount for the facility record
The tax amount calculated on the total fee amount from the corresponding field TOT.FEE.AMT
Indicates whether the corresponding tranche is alive or passed. If the tranche end date is not crossed then is updated with Y. A past tranch is indicated by updating N to "
The commitment fee percentage effective date for the unavailable amount. It is associated with the commitment fee percentage field
Holds the commitment fee percentage to be calculated on the unavailable amount
This is the key field to the file which holds the FACILITY ID for which this Corresponding balance record is created
Holds the movement amount when there is a movement in the tranche defined in the corresponding TRANCHE.CODE field and effective from a date defined at the corresponding field AMT.EFF.DATE
Holds the total tranche amount to the corresponding tranche define in the field TRANCHE.CODE
Initial facility amount expressed in the facility currency. This amount is updated from the facility record
Records the negative movement of the facility within a Tranche
Holds the outstanding balance of the facility effective on a date defined in the corresponding AMT.EFF.DATE field
effective date for the amounts defined in the corresponding fields SL.OUTS.AMT and SL.AMT.MOVED
The date which is used as the end date for the fee calculation
The date which is used as the starting date for the fee calculation
Holds the effective date of the processing fee amount
